reporter_caption.center: IN MATTER OF APPOINTMENT OF MEMBERS, 2011-65 (Ariz. 6-14-2011)

caption.center: In the Matter of: APPOINTMENT OF MEMBERS TO THE DOMESTIC RELATIONS

opinion.opinion_text:
In accordance with A.R.S. ยง 25-323.02, Laws 2002, Chapter 332, which created the Domestic Relations Committee, the Chief Justice is responsible for appointing six members of the total membership of 31 to the Domestic Relations Committee, consisting of two active or retired judges or commissioners or both from the domestic relations department of the Superior Court (one Rural and one Urban), a Clerk of the Superior Court, a representative of a conciliation court, an administrative officer of the Supreme Court, and a member of the Family Law Section of the State Bar of Arizona. Members serve at the will of the Chief Justice. Therefore, after due consideration,
IT IS ORDERED that the individuals listed below are appointed to the Domestic Relations Committee for terms beginning July 1, 2011 ending June 30, 2013.
New Appointments Honorable Michael Bluff Honorable Wayne E. Yehling Superior Court Judge Superior Court Commissioner Yavapai County Pima County
Dated this 14th day of June, 2011.Page 1
